                                function animator(currentItem) {

                                    var distance = currentItem.height();
                                    duration = (distance + parseInt(currentItem.css("marginTop"))) / 0.025;
                                    currentItem.animate({ marginTop: -distance }, duration, "linear", function () {

                                        currentItem.appendTo(currentItem.parent()).css("marginTop", 0);

         <div class="text-box">
          <div id="ContentPlaceHolder1_blogdescription" style="padding: 14px">
           <p style="text-align: justify;">
            If you could voice out your experience about generic Latisse, then you can find a lot many women like you who have come forward and written about their own experience of using this wonderful Latisse lash serum that has changed their life forever.
            <a href="http://www.fostermeds.com/Product/50-Buy-Bimatoprost-Online" target="_blank" title="Bimatoprost ophthalmic drug">
             <em>
              <strong>
               Bimatoprost ophthalmic drug
              </strong>
             </em>
            </a>
            is about a solution that was only known as a glaucoma drug until some shocking effects on the eyelashes occurred that began to grow with the use of this solution.
           </p>
           <p style="text-align: justify;">
            The media buzz of this lash growth product that got a large number of fans following, followed by a huge demand for its cosmetic use. An FDA approved drug, it is also safe to be applied on your eyelashes to get those pair of long and sparkling cilia your choice.
           </p>
           <p style="text-align: justify;">
            Eyelash hypotrichosis that is mainly known as absence or loss of the eyelashes that can be caused due to various reasons such as long term illness, over plucking, allergies and trimming etc. There has been a considerable shift from women who picked up fake eyelashes have started picking up
            <a href="http://www.fostermeds.com/Product/50-Buy-Bimatoprost-Online" target="_blank" title="bimatoprost serum for their eyelashes">
             <span style="text-decoration: underline;">
              <strong>
               bimatoprost serum for their eyelashes
              </strong>
             </span>
            </a>
            , as there are considerable side effects coming in along with the fake eyelashes you buy that is they mostly cause allergies and watery eyes, itching and sometimes falling off without getting noticed.
           </p>
           <p style="text-align: justify;">
            Latisse lash serum is simple quite different from the rest of the cosmetics with minimum side effects and if any depending upon each ones use and easy application process. Just a 4 week use and the conjugation of this lash serum and your eyelash roots, you will see how quickly your cilia turn dark, long and thick. Working women are busy and may not have sufficient time to get the serum on your eyelashes hence its just a question of one small drop on your eyelashes before you go to bed and the wonderful results are in within 4 weeks!
           </p>
